https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/4eYI863D3i37BjhZPphzKSjb5NO.jpg When she was seven, Elise Gardet witnessed her mother’s brutal murder. Ever since, she has tried to forget this unsolved crime. Now she’s 18 and beautiful, but her bourgeois family and her stepmother’s anxiety are suffocating her. A Sight for Sore Eyes
